Key Match Events: Tristan da Silva scored a career-high 25 points
Orlando made nine 3-pointers in the third quarter against San Antonio on Feb. 8, 2024
Orlando made nine in the third against the Lakers on Jan. 31, 2018
Four Magic players connected from deep in a 14-4 run late in the first that gave Orlando a lead it would never relinquish
Post-Match Reflections: Toronto snapped an 11-game losing streak by beating Brooklyn on Wednesday but couldn’t maintain any momentum
The Raptors haven’t won consecutive games since home victories over Miami and Indiana on Dec. 1 and 3
They’ve only won back-to-back games twice this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suggs was playing defense late in the second when he stumbled without any contact and fell over clutching at his lower back. He stayed down for several minutes before being helped into a wheelchair
Orlando's Cole Anthony matched a career high with 11 assists
Orlando shot 19 for 44 from 3-point range, improving to 18-6 this season when making 10 or more from distance. The Magic are 3-9 when they make nine or fewer 3s
